doc.previous: However Lavrentiev in 1926 showed that there are circumstances where there is no optimum solution but one can be approached arbitrarily closely by increasing numbers of sections For instance the following
doc.after: Here a zig zag path gives a better solution than any smooth path and increasing the number of sections improves the solution
